scripts.allure:timestamp: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path allure-results\history) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force allure-results\history }; $t=Get-Date -Format 'yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss'; $report='allure-report-' + $t; allure generate allure-results --clean --single-file -o $report; $driveBase='G:\My Drive\Automation-Reports\Playwright-Allure'; $latest=Join-Path $driveBase 'latest'; $archive=Join-Path $driveBase 'archive'; if (!(Test-Path $latest)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $latest | Out-Null }; if (!(Test-Path $archive)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $archive | Out-Null }; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force "$latest\*" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force $report (Join-Path $archive $report); Copy-Item -Recurse -Force "$report\*" $latest"
scripts.full-report: npm run purge && npm run clean && powershell -Command "npm run test; exit 0" && npm run allure:env && npm run allure:timestamp
